name: Goblin Scout
description: *Vanilla*

name: Energy Axe
description: Boost your leftmost creature's power by 3.

name: Knight
description: *Vanilla*

name: Wall Of Vines
description: Adds one mana each turn. *Defensive*: This creature does not attack.

name: Charging Bull
description: *Swift* (arrives ready to attack)

name: Portal Mage
description: *Arrival:* Return opposing creature to top of deck.

name: Vampire Swordmaster
description: Heals to full health upon killing an enemy.

name: Recurring Skeleton
description: *Immortal:* Upon death, returns to the bottom of your deck.

name: Focus
description: Gain 8 mana.

name: Avenging Tiger
description: *Arrival:* if opponent has more life than you, gains *Swift*.

name: Superior Intellect
description: Put all cards in your graveyard at the bottom of your library, then empty your opponent's graveyard completely.

name: Goblin Rally
description: Summon Goblin Scouts in all free lanes.

name: Thought Acquirer
description: *Arrival:* Remove the bottom card of opposing deck, and add it to the bottom of yours.

name: Inexorable Ooze
description: *Relentless* (attacks opponent directly)

name: Reanimate
description: Return the leftmost creature of your graveyard to the battlefield. It becomes *Undead*.

name: Goblin Chieftain
description: *Arrival:* Adds a Goblin Warboss to the bottom of your deck.

name: Goblin Warboss
description: *Arrival:* Adds a Goblin Expendable to the bottom of your deck.

name: Apprentice Assassin
description: Gains 2 power upon killing an enemy.

name: Goblin Expendable
description: *Swift* (arrives ready to attack)

name: Master Of Strategy
description: *Arrival:* Each of your other creatures permanently gain +1/+1.

name: Slayer
description: *Arrival:* If opposite an undead creature, destroy it immediately.

name: Bloodrager
description: Upon killing an enemy, heals to full health and becomes *Relentless*.

name: Spiteful Fang
description: *Arrival*: if opponent has more life than you, gains +2/+2. *Relentless*

name: Nap
description: Gain 2 HP.

name: Totem of Champions
description: All your creatures get +1 power. All opponent's creatures get -1 power.

name: Amnesia Mage
description: *Arrival:* Opponent loses 2 mana, then an additional mana for each card in your graveyard.

name: Overconcentrate
description: Opponent's leftmost creature becomes *Relentless*.

name: Goblin Recruiter
description: *Arrival*: if opponent has more life than you, summon a Goblin Scout in all free lanes.

name: Vengeful Warlord
description: *Arrival*: if opponent has more life than you, gains +1/+1.

name: Corpsecraft Titan
description: Cannot be summoned unless you have three creatures in your graveyard. *Arrival*: Consume 3 creatures from your graveyard.

name: Insatiable Devourer
description: *Arrival*: Sacrifice all other creatures you control. For each creature thus consumed, Insatiable Devourer gets +2/+2.

name: Repentant Samurai
description: When Repentant Samurai deals damage to the opponent for the second time, sacrifice it.

name: Cursed Samurai
description: *Death*: Returns as a 3/3 undead creature (Returned Samurai).

name: Glassgraft
description: Reanimate the rightmost creature in your graveyard. After it deals damage to the opponent, sacrifice it.

name: Returned Samurai
description: His blade still thirsts for blood.

name: Unmake
description: Destroy opponent's leftmost living creature. (Living creatures are not Undead or Inanimate)

name: Skeletal Infantry
description: Upon killing an enemy, heals to full health and becomes *Relentless*.

name: Reassembling Legion
description: *Immortal:* Upon death, returns to the bottom of your deck.

name: Ghoul
description: *Arrival:* Place the bottom card of opponent's deck into their graveyard.

name: Pikemen
description: *Vanilla*

name: Goliath
description: *Vanilla*

name: War Elephant
description: *Vanilla*

name: Dreadhorde
description: *Vanilla Undead*

name: Bog Giant
description: *Vanilla*

name: Knight of Opposites
description: *Arrival:* Swaps the HP of the players.

name: Malignant Imp
description: Deals one additional damage if attacking the opponent directly.

name: Walking Sarcophagus
description: When this creature deals damage to the opponent, sacrifice it, then return the leftmost creature of your graveyard.

name: Indulged Princeling
description: *Arrival*: Place the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. (Sacrifice this creature if unable)

name: Elsewhere
description: Opponent's leftmost creature is returned to the bottom of their deck.

name: Carnivorous Plant
description: *Arrival*: Place a Goblin Scout in your graveyard.

name: Chanter of Ashes
description: *Arrival*: Consume all creatures from your graveyard. Deal damage to the opponent equal to twice their number.

name: Goblin Gladiator
description: Deals 3 additional damage to creatures with four or greater power.

name: Inferno
description: Deals 2 damage to all creatures.

name: Flamewielder
description: *Arrival*: Deal 1 damage to all opposing creatures.

name: Rampaging Cyclops
description: *Arrival*: Deal 1 damage to all creatures in all lanes.
